Name: Pear & Elderflower Fruitini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of pear slice on rim.
Review: Pear and elderflower fortified with vodka.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2001 by Angelo Vieira at St. Martins, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Pear & Elderflower Fruitini contains 158 calories
